title: Economic incentives for woodland creation on farmland: Modelling the impacts on biodiversity
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 224

Author(s): Mary Nthambi, Katherine Simpson, Tom Bradfer-Lawrence, Andrew Dobson, Tom Finch, Elisa Fuentes-Montemayor, Kirsty Park, Kevin Watts, Nick Hanley
